code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';export const databaseAPI={async getStats(){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/database/stats/"));return response.data;},async testConnection(){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/database/test/"));return response.data;}};
